External event selector for regular group conversion.
ADC sample times, in ADC clock cycles.

detaileddescription.para: These control the amount of time spent sampling the input voltage.
Initializes the RCC clock line for the given peripheral. Resets ADC device registers.

briefdescription.para: Set external event select for regular group.

parameterdescription.para: Event used to trigger the start of conversion.

briefdescription.para: Call a function on all ADC devices.

parameterdescription.para: Function to call on each ADC device.

briefdescription.para: Turn the given sample rate into values for ADC_SMPRx.

detaileddescription.para:
Don't call this during conversion.
dev
adc device
smp_rate
sample rate to set
adc_smp_rate

briefdescription.para: Perform a single synchronous software triggered conversion on a channel.

parameterdescription.para: ADC device to use for reading.

briefdescription.para: Set the regular channel sequence length.

detaileddescription.para: Defines the total number of conversions in the regular channel conversion sequence.

parameterdescription.para: Regular channel sequence length, from 1 to 16.

briefdescription.para: Set external trigger conversion mode event for regular channels.

parameterdescription.para: If 1, conversion on external events is enabled; if 0, disabled.
